name: The March to heaven
description:
Synopsis

It’s the year 2022. Despite modern advances to healthcare, there are still some things that modern medicine can’t cure. Your sister suffers from one such condition and their body is gradually shutting down. They can be preserved for a short while using life support devices, but their demise is inevitable...

Description

A visual novel with sim elements, juggle between managing stress and earning enough cash to pay for hospital bills, as you make different choices throughout the day and progress the story~ The game length isn’t very long, you can play it in one sitting, hope you enjoy the game~!

Credits

Lead Programmer and Team lead - Damakuno

Lead Artist and Concept Artist - Kurlby

UI Programmer and UI Artist - Mayonakaweisz

Lead Writer - Alphasentinal
